title: U.S. arms exports 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2002 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, and finally slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2003 and 2004.
Maximum Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars, about 9022.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars about 4953.0 was reached at Year 2002
